name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nitro Type stats on race page viewer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily access info from the Nitro Type stats page on the race page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily access the stats (such as session race, average speed, etc) on the race page. -- Requested by Nate Dogg

Click on the extension's icon to select and unselect the items that you don't want to be viewed on the race page. Then click update.
